::Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Reptilica's gaze shifts to Desmonus as she lets go of his hand, 
glancing at Bloodystrike with a hostile look before answering 
Desmonus.

"I'm very sorry, my lady," he says, "If Bloodystrike here's wasn't a 
rude bot, this situation would improve immensly. Perhaps we can send 
him away for now?"

On the other side of Desmonus, Bloodystrike was making barely 
controlled sounds of rage, his fists clenching and unclenching. If 
only there wasn't a femm in the way....





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Desmonus caught the threatening look Bloodystrike gave Reptilica 
and 
> simply sighes, her optics narrowed and her back a little stiff.
> Were all men like this?
> Greedy little switch board who want everything to themselves.
> If that was true then the opisit sex from her was obviously doomed 
to 
> extinction.
> But she simply went along as planned.*
> 
> " Hmm...I think his manners are just fine, Bloodystrike. Just as 
yours are."
>

men 
> around hers was.
> She simply let go of their hands and crossed her arms, but keeping 
in step

getting
